name: Happyguest London
description:
Happyguest London helps you short-let your properties and maximise potential rental income stress-free, hassle-free.

Full management service and On-demand service.

We are a short-let property management service company based in London, run by experienced property owners and Airbnb hosts who offer the most personalised services on the market. 

We are all about putting a personal touch to managing clients' properties. Importantly, Happyguest brings homeowners' perspective and understanding of your needs, and treat your properties like how we do our own.

Value to our clients: 
"We take care of your homes so you can enjoy the world!"

jobs.title: Operation Coordinator
jobs.description:
We’re looking for an enthusiastic, detail-oriented, organised team member to manage the day-to-day shortlet property management operations. Ideally with prior relevant experience working in a similar role in hotel or vacation rental industry. This involves: 

- Respond to guest enquiries on various rental platforms
- Screen guest, check their ID & background, accept/decline the reservation
- Update database with reservation information
- Manage and approve guest check-in and check-out times 
- Schedule and organise housekeeping services before the guest is due to check-in or after guest checks out
- Order linen & household supplies for housekeeping services
- Carry out housekeeping checks and guest check-ins
- Provide guest support during their stay

You will be responsible for communicating with guests, housekeepers, linen providers, handyman, estate agent etc to ensure everything runs smoothly, all our properties are spotless & sparkling, and guests are happy!

This is a part time or full time position at £8-10/hour depending on experience if you're based in London.  

Remote working is possible.

There will be a 2-week on-boarding unpaid period to receive training.
